edu.umass.cs.gnsclient.client

Interface GNSClientInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GNSClientCommands, UniversalHttpClient, UniversalHttpClientExtended

    public interface GNSClientInterface
    The interface all the various GNS client classes should implement.
    Author:
    westy

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Register a new account guid with the corresponding alias on the GNS server.

      void stop()

    • Method Detail

      • stop

        void stop()
        Shuts down the client.

      • getGNSInstance

        String getGNSInstance()
        Return a string representing the GNS server that we are connecting to. NOTE THAT THIS STRING SHOULD BE DIFFERENT FOR DIFFERENT SERVERS (say a local test server vs the one on EC2 otherwise the key pair storage code overwrite keys with the same name that are being used for different servers.
        Returns:
        a string representing the GNS server

      • lookupGuidRecord

        org.json.JSONObject lookupGuidRecord(String guid)
                              throws IOException,
                                     ClientException
        Returns a JSON object containing all of the guid information
        Parameters:
        guid -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        IOException
        ClientException

      • accountGuidCreate

        GuidEntry accountGuidCreate(String alias,
                            String password)
                     throws Exception
        Register a new account guid with the corresponding alias on the GNS server. This generates a new guid and a public / private key pair. Returns a GuidEntry for the new account which contains all of this information.
        Parameters:
        alias - - a human readable alias to the guid - usually an email address
        password - - a required password argument used as a failsafe accessor for the account
        Returns:
        Throws:
        Exception

      • accountGuidVerify

        String accountGuidVerify(GuidEntry guid,
                         String code)
                  throws Exception
        Verify an account by sending the verification code back to the server.
        Parameters:
        guid - the account GUID to verify
        code - the verification code
        Returns:
        ?
        Throws:
        Exception

      • guidCreate

        GuidEntry guidCreate(GuidEntry accountGuid,
                     String alias)
              throws Exception
        Creates an new GUID associated with an account on the GNS server.
        Parameters:
        accountGuid -
        alias - the alias
        Returns:
        the newly created GUID entry
        Throws:
        Exception

      • checkConnectivity

        void checkConnectivity()
                throws IOException
        Check that the connectivity with host:port can be established
        Throws:
        IOException - throws exception if a communication error occurs
